attributes.action: Reduce carehome fees. People should not have to sell their home to pay the fees
attributes.additional_details: The Government encourages people to work and buy their own homes. But realistically if they were housed by their local council and did not work , then when the time came for them requiring care they get it free. When hard working home owners pay over £1000 a week !!! Selling there homes etc to pay for it.
attributes.background: Reduce carehome fees, people should not have to sell their homes that they worked hard to buy, to pay for fees when tenants don't have to pay. Over £1000 a week is ridiculous amount to pay. That gives a care home of 50 residents £2600,000.00 a year !!!!!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Care home fees are set by individual providers.

The Government is introducing a cap in 2023, which you can read more about here

https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/build-back-better-our-plan-for-health-and-social-care/adult-social-care-charging-reform-further-details

If you'd like changes to this cap, or for it to be introduced sooner, we could accept a petition calling for either of those options.
